title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors

I put these around my yard to help keep snakes and other critters away, and they’ve worked well for us. Each unit is solar-powered, so there are no batteries to mess with. They send out ultrasonic pulses about every 30 seconds to discourage animals from hanging around. One set covers up to about 7,000 sq. ft., and you get four in the pack, so it’s great for larger yards, gardens, and around sheds or patios.

What I like:
- Chemical-free and safe for kids and pets.
- Weather-resistant with IP44 waterproofing, so rain isn’t a problem.
- Made with premium materials and built to last.
- Helps deter more than just snakes—also deer, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels.

How to use:
- Turn the units on and let them charge in the sun for 4–5 hours before the first use.
- Install them so the head is about 2 inches above the soil.
- They emit a buzzing/sonic pulse (about 400±100 Hz) to make the area uncomfortable for snakes and other animals. It’s normal to hear a brief buzz as they work.
- Give them 2–4 weeks to reach full effectiveness as animals change their routes.

Extra notes:
- They pulse automatically every 30 seconds.
- One unit covers up to 7,000 ft²; place them so the coverage areas overlap a bit for best results.
- Solar power keeps them running without cords or outlets.
- Tip: Turn them on before putting them in the sun the first day to ensure a full charge.

If you want an easy, low-maintenance way to discourage snakes and other wildlife without chemicals, this 4-pack has been a simple, set-it-and-forget-it solution for our outdoor space.
